Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets have a strong home record and rank second in team defense, while the Celtics are strong on the road and in assists led by Jayson Tatum.
The Rockets are shooting 44.3% from the field, while the Celtics allow opponents to shoot 45.5%.
Alperen Sengun is averaging 19.1 points, 10.7 rebounds, and 5.1 assists, while Jayson Tatum is averaging 28.5 points, 9.5 rebounds, and 5.6 assists.
Others: The game is a non-conference showdown with the Rockets hosting the Celtics on January 4, 2025.
